title: How to Make Raspberry Slice

steps.headline: Add the egg yolk and mix in.
steps.description: Add the dry ingredients next and mix well.

steps.headline: Line the baking pan with parchment paper.
Spread the slice ingredients across the parchment paper.
Spread raspberry jam across the top of the slice.
Beat the egg white until stiff.
steps.description: Add 1/2 cup sugar and the 1 cup of shredded coconut. Spread the topping over the raspberry jam.

steps.headline: Remove from oven.
steps.description: Allow to cool before slicing into slices.

text: Cream the butter and sugar.  Add the egg yolk and mix in. Add the dry ingredients next and mix well. Line the baking pan with parchment paper. Preheat the oven to 350ºF/180ºC. Spread the slice ingredients across the parchment paper.  Spread raspberry jam across the top of the slice.  Beat the egg white until stiff. Add 1/2 cup sugar and the 1 cup of shredded coconut. Spread the topping over the raspberry jam. Place in the oven. Bake for 20 minutes. Remove from oven. Allow to cool before slicing into slices. Finished.
